cu.explanation_en: Setting the SCTP input streams to an excessively high value of 100 will exceed protocol limits and cause SCTP association failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of downlink symbols to an invalid value of 20 will exceed the maximum allowed symbols for the TDD pattern and cause scheduling failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行符號數設定為無效的值 20，將超過 TDD 模式允許的最大符號數，並導致調度失敗。
